name: Delay of Gratification Experiment
description: Scores from a delay of gratification experiment measured at Day 0 and Day 60.

columns.name: Patient
columns.description: Identifier number for each patient in the study.

columns.name: D0
columns.description: Patients baseline score or measurement taken on Day 0.

columns.name: Diff
columns.description: Change in score from 0 dose to 60mg dose. Positive indicates improvement, negative indicates decline.
